0.text: STATIC COOLDOWN: 24 − 12 (BASED ON LEVEL)
24 − 12 (BASED ON LEVEL)

Innate: Periodically, Aatrox empowers his next basic attack to gain  50 bonus range and deal 5% − 12% (based on level) of the target's maximum health as bonus physical damage, capped at 100 against  monsters. Aatrox  heals for 100% of the post-mitigation damage dealt, reduced to 25% against  minions.
0.html:
Innate: Periodically, Aatrox empowers his next basic attack to gain  50 bonus range and deal 5% − 12% (based on level) of the target's maximum health as bonus physical damage, capped at 100 against monsters.
Aatrox heals for 100% of the post-mitigation damage dealt, reduced to 25% against minions.

1.text: Whenever Aatrox hits at least one enemy  champion or large  monster with a basic attack  on-hit or an ability, the cooldown of Deathbringer Stance is  reduced by 2 seconds, modified to 4 if he hits with the Sweetspot of  The Darkin Blade.
1.html: Whenever Aatrox hits at least one enemy champion or large monster with a basic attack on-hit or an ability, the cooldown of Deathbringer Stance is  reduced by 2 seconds, modified to 4 if he hits with the Sweetspot of The Darkin Blade.

monster
on-hit
reduced
The Darkin Blade

0.text: RANGE: VARIED

1.text: CAST TIME: 0.6

0.text: Active: Aatrox can activate The Darkin Blade three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a 1 second static cooldown between casts. If Aatrox does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, it goes on cooldown.
0.html: Active: Aatrox can activate The Darkin Blade three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a 1 second static cooldown between casts. If Aatrox does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, it goes on cooldown.

1.text: Aatrox performs a strike with his greatsword for each of the three casts, dealing physical damage to enemies hit within an area. Enemies hit within a Sweetspot of the area take  60% bonus damage and also  knocked up for 0.25 seconds. Each subsequent cast increases The Darkin Blade's damage by 25%.
1.html: Aatrox performs a strike with his greatsword for each of the three casts, dealing physical damage to enemies hit within an area. Enemies hit within a Sweetspot of the area take 60% bonus damage and also knocked up for 0.25 seconds. Each subsequent cast increases The Darkin Blade's damage by 25%.
markedPassages: knocked up

2.text: First Cast: Aatrox's first strike affects a 625 × 180-unit rectangular area in the target direction, with him centered on the back line and the Sweetspot at the farthest edge.
2.html: First Cast: Aatrox's first strike affects a 625 × 180-unit rectangular area in the target direction, with him centered on the back line and the Sweetspot at the farthest edge.

3.text: Second Cast: Aatrox's second strike affects a trapezoidal area in the target direction, with the Sweetspot at the farthest edge. The hitbox begins 100-units behind Aatrox and extends 475-units in front of him, measuring between 300 and 500-units wide from behind to in front.
3.html: Second Cast: Aatrox's second strike affects a trapezoidal area in the target direction, with the Sweetspot at the farthest edge. The hitbox begins 100-units behind Aatrox and extends 475-units in front of him, measuring between 300 and 500-units wide from behind to in front.

4.text: Third Cast: Aatrox's third strike affects a 300-radius circular area centered on a target location that is 200 units in front of him, with a 180-radius Sweetspot within.
4.html: Third Cast: Aatrox's third strike affects a 300-radius circular area centered on a target location that is 200 units in front of him, with a 180-radius Sweetspot within.

5.text: The Darkin Blade deals 55% damage against  minions, and the  knock up duration from hitting the Sweetspot is doubled to 0.5 seconds against  monsters.
5.html: The Darkin Blade deals 55% damage against minions, and the knock up duration from hitting the Sweetspot is doubled to 0.5 seconds against monsters.
markedPassages: minions
knock up
monsters

1.text: WIDTH:  160

2.text: SPEED: 1800

0.text: Active: Aatrox sends a chain in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against  minions, and  slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Aatrox sends a chain in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against minions, and slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: minions
slowing

1.text: If this hits an enemy  champion or large  monster, a  revealing  tether is formed between the target and the ground beneath them for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: If this hits an enemy champion or large monster, a revealing tether is formed between the target and the ground beneath them for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
monster
revealing
tether

2.text: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt the same physical damage again and  pulled to the center of the area.
2.html: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt the same physical damage again and pulled to the center of the area.
markedPassages: pulled

0.html: Passive: Aatrox  heals for a portion of the non- persistent post-mitigation damage he deals against enemy champions, increased during World Ender.

heals
persistent
World Ender

1.text: Active: Aatrox  dashes in the target direction.
1.html: Active: Aatrox dashes in the target direction.
markedPassages: dashes

2.text: Umbral Dash  resets Aatrox's basic attack timer and can be cast during his other abilities without cancelling them and vice versa.
2.html: Umbral Dash resets Aatrox's basic attack timer and can be cast during his other abilities without cancelling them and vice versa.
markedPassages: resets

0.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 600

1.text: CAST TIME: 0.25

2.text: COOLDOWN: 120 / 100 / 80

0.text: Active: Aatrox unleashes his true demonic form,  fearing nearby enemy  minions and  monsters for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually  slowed by up to 99% over the duration. For the next 10 seconds, Aatrox gains  ghosting and  bonus movement speed that decays by 10% of the current bonus every 0.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Aatrox unleashes his true demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and monsters for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually slowed by up to 99% over the duration. For the next 10 seconds, Aatrox gains ghosting and  bonus movement speed that decays by 10% of the current bonus every 0.25 seconds.

minions
monsters
slowed

1.html: During this time, Aatrox gains  bonus attack damage and 5% increased size, and receives increased self-healing from all sources.

bonus attack damage
self-healing

Passive

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 health
+6 health per 5 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to 66% effectiveness on ranged champions or when triggered by AoE, DoT or proc effects.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+18 Lethality (11.2 − 18 (based on level) armor penetration)
+7% omnivamp

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ever Rising Moon: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a shield for ( 160 / 80) (+ ( 35% / 17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 / 16) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 4% armor penetration, and 5 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – EVER RISING MOON: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a  shield for ( 160 /  80) (+ ( 35% /  17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 /  16) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  750

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+45 attack damage
+30 ability haste
+350 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CARVE: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+50 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs ( 200 / 150) (+ ( 225% / 168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
Unique: Triggering Lifeline also grants 10% omnivamp for 5 seconds. After 2 seconds into the duration, taking or dealing damage refreshes this effect to 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs ( 200 /  150) (+ ( 225% /  168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to 66% effectiveness on ranged champions or when triggered by AoE, DoT or proc effects.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
